name: LEGO Friends
overview: LEGO Friends on the 3DS welcomes the player to Heartlake City where summer fun awaits. Meet your new LEGO Friends and join them on adventures that build friendships with the girls and allow you to express your style and personality as you explore the city. Shop for the latest outfits and accessories, select the perfect hairstyle, decorate your bedroom and even pick out a pet. Aimed at younger female gamers, LEGO Friends sends players to help friends with a variety of tasks including horseback riding competitions, cupcake delivery, and newspaper photography. Gamers can also play soccer, go dancing, hang out at a café, or train a pet to do tricks, and they can snap photos of it all for their in-game scrapbook.
